title: Questions for a candidate
author: VD
content_html: I am one of the many bloggers asked by the campaign staff for former NevadaNew Mexico governor Gary Johnson, one of the Republican dark horses, to take part in a conference call later this week. Does anyone have any questions that they would particularly like me to ask? I have two or three related to the economy, but I thought I’d throw this out there to see what else might be of current interest to the Ilk.
content_text:
I am one of the many bloggers asked by the campaign staff for former
Nevada
New Mexico governor Gary Johnson, one of the Republican dark horses, to take part in a conference call later this week.  Does anyone have any questions that they would particularly like me to ask?  I have two or three related to the economy, but I thought I’d throw this out there to see what else might be of current interest to the Ilk.
